name: Rustclaw Scavenger
description: This hunched vermin-like creature moves on all fours, its oily grey skin mottled with patches of rust. Its most striking feature are the razor-sharp claws tipped in a brittle orange rust; each movement leaves a faint metallic scent in the air.

flavor.rationale: The Rustclaw Scavengers are drawn to areas with high concentrations of discarded cybernetics and electronic waste. Their mutation grants them the ability to consume rust, which allows their claws to grow stronger and sharper. The sewers and alleys provide ample opportunity for scavenging and hunting in darkness.
